ch.ethz.inf.vs.appserver.jscoap
Class AsynchronousSender

java.lang.Object
  ch.ethz.inf.vs.appserver.jscoap.AbstractSender
      ch.ethz.inf.vs.appserver.jscoap.AsynchronousSender
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sender
public class AsynchronousSender
extends AbstractSender

AsynchronousSender implements the process to send a request assynchronously. Conforms to the CoAPRequest API (http://lantersoft.ch/download/bachelorthesis/CoAPRequest_API.pdf)

Only one of the functions onload, ontimeout, onerror gets called (according to the outcome of the request).

Author:
Martin Lanter
